Topic.Title: Lost all of my coding behind a Squiffy project

Posts.EditableText:
The **listing is still there** along with the description, the **game is still playable** and has all the choices and story I left, yet when I click "Edit Game", **all the coding and story is gone**. 

It's not too big of a deal since the game is still playable, I can copy and paste the story back where it's supposed to be and just recode it, I'm just wondering if this is common or recoverable. Definitely switching to offline after this though, I'm considering this a warning.
Posts.HTML:
The listing is still there along with the description, the game is still playable and has all the choices and story I left, yet when I click "Edit Game", all the coding and story is gone.

It's not too big of a deal since the game is still playable, I can copy and paste the story back where it's supposed to be and just recode it, I'm just wondering if this is common or recoverable. Definitely switching to offline after this though, I'm considering this a warning.

Posts.EditableText:
Yeah, I stay offline. That way I control my code. Even if this site goes belly-up tomorrow, I still have my game.

Sorry to hear this.
